trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection> class allows you to programmatically access a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> object to the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection.Add%2A> method to add a new <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement> object to the collection.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
Gets the keys to all items contained in the <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection"></xref>.
A string array.
Clears the <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection"></xref>.
When the <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection.Clear%2A> method is called, it removes all <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement> objects from the collection.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> object based on the supplied parameter.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection.Item%2A> property to get or set a <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement> object based on the `name` parameter.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> contained in the collection.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
Removes a <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> object from the collection based on the provided parameter.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement> from the collection.
Override in a derived class if custom behavior is required when the element is removed.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
Removes a <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> object from the collection based on the provided parameter.
Use the <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement> from the collection.
Override in a derived class if custom behavior is required when the element is removed.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.NameValueConfigurationElement"></xref> object.
